page.title: 15THE MEDIA
page.content:
MOST RESIDENTS IN THE AREA HAVE RADIO AND TELEVISION IN THEIR HOMES,MANY ALSO HAVE A VIDEO RECORDER.TWO VILLAGE SHOPS HIRE OUT PRERECORDED TAPES OF FEATURE FILMS.ALL HOMES RECEIVE ANGLIA CHANNEL 4,BBC 1&2 TELEVISION CHANNELS, WHILE A FEW RECEIVE LONDON STATIONS.
ALL NATIONAL RADIO STATIONS ARE RECEIVED,IN ADDITION TO LOCAL BBC RADIO BEDFORDSHIRE AND NORTHAMPTON, THERE ARE TWO INDEPENDENT STATIONS, CHILTERN AND HEREWARD.
THERE ARE TWO LOCAL NEWSPAPERS,THE EVENING POST & ECHO DELIVERED EACH EVENING,AND THE WEEKLY AMPTHILL & FLITWICK TIMES,IN WHICH THE VILLAGE CORRESPONDENT GIVES AN IN-DEPTH ACCOUNT OF VILLAGE NEWS IN A REGULAR COLUMN.
